name: cxone-rich-content
description: An extension for NICE CXone rich content functionality, providing custom nodes for easier dev/build of CXone integrated conversations.

scripts.zip: tar cfz $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tar.gz build/* package.json package-lock.json README.md icon.png
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run lint && npm run zip

author: Ben Elliot
